summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 MERCEDES-BENZ C300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN AN UNKNOWN RECALL REGARDING THE AIR BAGS, BUT THERE WAS NO REMEDY FOR THE DEFECT. THE MANUFACTURER AND MERCEDES-BENZ OF RICHMOND (225 W BROAD ST, HENRICO, VA 23294, (804) 755-9300) WERE CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. *TT  *TR
